name: Dummy Smacker
description:
CONTROLS: 
WASD - move
CLICK - attack
TAB - menu

You are in a room. Your name is Kare Akter. These are the only two things you know.

Current Version Details

5/20/20 Alpha 0
Release. There's not much here yet. I've only implemented one type of dummy, and there's nothing that can fight back yet. The skill tree is small, and only a few items and objects exist. This is more of a demo than a game at this point, but there's more to come!

5/20/20 Hotfix A0H1
-Fixed a crash when using the sling with no ammo selected.
-Added a sound to the sling.
